summary: Wealthy, inventive bachelor Colin endeavors to find a cure for his lover Chloe after she's diagnosed with an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs.
cast: Romain Duris|Audrey Tautou|Gad Elmaleh|Omar Sy|Aïssa Maïga|Charlotte Le Bon|Sacha Bourdo|Vincent Rottiers|Philippe Torreton|Laurent Lafitte|Alain Chabat|Zinedine Soualem|Natacha Régnier|Marina Rozenman|Mathieu Paulus|Frédéric Saurel|Wilfred Benaïche|Alex Raul Barrios|Maurice Maréchal|Jean-Yves Cressenville|Mourad Boudaoud|Nicolas Brun|François Hiffler|Francis Van Litsenborgh|Kid Creole|Paul Gondry|Cosme Castro|Bobby Few|Nathalie Kanoui|Jeanne Cellard|Louise Mast|Yan Brian|Tilly Scott Pedersen|Julien Seul|Fabien Jegoudez|Calypso Valois|Pascale Murtin|Romain Gondry|Mohamed Ouachen|Jean-Pierre Denuit|Frederic Etherlinck|David Bolling|Jérôme Coué|Charlotte Pouch|Meriem Temim|Laura Cieplik|Joana Morais|Simone Hérault|Julie Sozza-Barbier|Irina Aleksandrova|Carl Ernouf|Michel Gondry|Stéphane Harck|Jennifer Kerner|Adeline Moreau|Daniel Semporé

title: La espuma de los días
